input_output_options.title: Input/output options
input_output_options.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data and save output data.

input_directory.description: A path to an input directory containing FASTQs, either in .zip files or in sub-directories. Mutually exclusive with and takes precedence over --samplesheet.

samplesheet.description: A path to a CSV samplesheet describing samples and the paths to the directories or .zip files containing their FASTQs. Mutually exclusive with --input_directory and ignored if that parameter is set.

outdir.description: The output directory where the results will be saved. You have to use absolute paths to storage on Cloud infrastructure.

sequencing_summary.description: Path to the sequencing summary file generated by your ONT run.

assemblers.description: A comma-separated string of assemblers to use. Currently supports unicycler and flye. Note that flye is always enabled.

subsamples.description: Number of subsamples to create of each sample using autocycler subsample.

max_contigs.description: Maximum number of contigs to allow during autocycler consensus assembly. Leave blank for default.

nci_gadi_configuration.title: NCI Gadi configuration
nci_gadi_configuration.description: Provide if running this pipeline on NCI Gadi, ignore otherwise.

gadi_user.description: Your Gadi username (e.g. aa1111). Leave blank for the default user account.

gadi_storage.description: Storage location(s) holding data required by pipeline (e.g. scratch/aa11 or scratch/aa11+gdata/aa11)

gadi_account.description: Account to bill service units to.

singularityCacheDir.description: Define an alternate location for downloaded containers. Leave blank for the default.
